nodes.title: Negative Prompt
widgets_values: bad quality, worst quality, lowres, jpeg artifacts, bad anatomy, bad hands, bad proportions, mutated, deformed, deformed hands, multiple views, signature, watermark, copyright, text, censored, ugly, broken, 5fingers

nodes.title: Prefix (1)
widgets_values: masterpiece, best quality, face, realistic, product_art, solo, stunning beautiful

nodes.title: Prompt Subject (3)
widgets_values: long, flowing hair shifts like tendrils of smoke

nodes.title: Wildcard Processor (4)
widgets_values: the face of a beautiful woman with fair skin, and long, {straight|messy|wavy} {blonde|white|red|black} hair. She has {blue|green|grey|brown} eyes and a {subtle tasteful|dark} makeup look that accentuates her features, she wears a {red|white|black|pink} form fitting {dress|suit|bikini|lace underwear}, skin press, her expression is naughty, moaning, half closed eyes, her head is slightly tilted back, she looks seductivly to the viewer
Select the Wildcard to add to the text

Behold, the stunningly beautiful and macabre 'Eternal Siren' - a cinematic shot that embodies the essence of Slaanesh, the Chaos God of pleasure and pain. This hyper-detailed rendering is a testament to the power of art and the human form, as a unique ice-inspired humanoid stands before you, her long, flowing hair shifting like tendrils of smoke in the moonlight.

Her black sclera seems to pierce through the darkness, as if she is gazing directly into your soul. The delicate, wing-like collar around her neck is a subtle nod to the ethereal beauty that lies within. And yet, the black rose that adorns her forehead is a stark reminder of the darkness that lurks beneath.

This 32k UHD masterpiece is a true work of art, with every detail meticulously crafted to create a sense of haunting, gothic beauty. The transparent background allows the viewer to focus on the subject, drawing them in with an otherworldly allure.

The delicate, wing-like collar around her neck is a subtle nod to the ethereal beauty that lies within. And yet, the black rose that adorns her forehead is a stark reminder of the darkness that lurks beneath.

This 32k UHD masterpiece is a true work of art, with every detail meticulously crafted to create a sense of haunting, gothic beauty. The transparent background allows the viewer to focus on the subject, drawing them in with an otherworldly allure.

Whether you're a fan of dark, gothic aesthetics or simply appreciate the beauty of the human form, 'Eternal Siren' is a must-have for any art lover. So, immerse yourself in this stunning, realistic portrait and let the beauty of the macabre consume you."

nodes.title: Note: Installation
widgets_values:
if you don't have llama_cpp installed (ignore the cu124 version it works on 12.8 too):

- python_embeded\python.exe -m pip install https://github.com/abetlen/llama-cpp-python/releases/download/v0.3.4-cu124/llama_cpp_python-0.3.4-cp312-cp312-win_amd64.whl

 install the custom node with the manager or manual:
- https://github.com/gokayfem/ComfyUI_VLM_nodes?tab=readme-ov-file

 download a model and save it to:
- "comfyui\models\LLavacheckpoints\gguf\Lexi-Llama-3-8B-Uncensored_Q4_K_M.gguf"

 download the model from here:
- https://huggingface.co/Orenguteng/Llama-3-8B-Lexi-Uncensored-GGUF/tree/main
